shri lanka podujana peramune nayakathwaye kisidu wenasak sidunowana bawa amathya chamal rajapaksha prakasha kala.ee baththaramulla - nelum mawathe pihiti podujana peramune pradhana karyalaya parishraye nawa wruththiya samithi madhyasthanaya idikirima sandaha mulgal thabime awasthawata ada perawaruwe ekwemin.shri lanka podu jana peramune wruththiya samithi wyaparaya shakthimath kirime mulika aramunin “sewaka piyasa“ namin siyalu pahasukam walin samanwitha themahal godanagillak mehi idikerenawa.
siyambaalanduwa ampara pradhana margaya dige nellikale hoya apata atharamaga di kala wimasumakadi gamiyek kiya.
[ee jathiya thawath jathiyak ilakka kala samulaghathanaya manushika meheyuma namin handinwuha.]
kakusanda, konagama budurajananwahanselage shasanawala manushyange paramayusha awurudu thisdahak.

udghoshanayata sahabhagi wemin uthuru palath nithignya sangamaye sabhapathi jyeshta nithignya antan punidanayagam mahatha kiya sitiye, ‘api ada udasana sitama uthuru palathe inna siyaluma nithignya warun wadawarjanaya aarambha kala me wada warjanaya sikurada wenakam api sidu karanawa apita wisandumak labenathuru mulathiw gurukanda wiharaye wiharadhipathi himiyange aadahana katayuthu wihara bhumiyen epita muhudu werale sidu karanna kiyala mulathiw mahesthrath es.lenin kumar mahatha niyoga kala ewani niyogayak di thibunu awasthawaka bodu bala sena himi athulu pirisak wisin adhikarana niyogaya kada karamin wiharadhipathi himiyange aadahana katayuthu pansal bhumiya thulama sidu kala meken pansal bhumiye thibunu nirawi pullayar kowile bathimathunta wigema pujakayintath ee ayage sanskruthiyatath dadi asadaranayak wune ee wagema thamayi aadahana pujothsawaya pawathi welawe ape damila nithignyawarayekuta pansale pirisak balapam karala thiyanawa me siyalu de wenuwen sadharanayak wenna oona himi athulu pirisa adhikaranayata idiripath kala yuthuyi adhikarana nithiya kadu pirisata nithiya kriyathmaka kala yuthuyi kiyala thamayi api me wirodhathawaya pawathwanne, yanuweni.
